name: .PZA File Extension
summary: Learn about .PZA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Photo album created by PhotoSuite, an image editor and organizer; contains images assembled by the PhotoSuite application and organized in customized albums.

content: MGI PhotoSuite was purchased by Roxio and became Roxio PhotoShow. PZA files created by PhotoSuite are not compatible with PhotoShow. PhotoSuite, which is now included with Roxio Creator, can open PZA files.
NOTE: .PZP files are project files that can create PZA files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
